COMPE 560: UDP-based chat application documentation¶

A secure UDP‐based chat application built in Python for COMPE 560. It provides real‐time encrypted communication between multiple clients via a central server, using hybrid RSA/AES encryption, HMAC authentication, and a curses‐based terminal UI.
